title: Love
description: There is an alternate cover edition for this ASIN here.Two brothers, like Cain and Abel they are destined to go up against each other.Palmer has taken a small inheritance from his grandmother and, with a lot of hard work, has turned it into millions. His construction company is continuing to grow, and so is his brother's jealously.Connor had the same inheritance, but has very little of it left. Fast cars, and even faster women, have taken it all.Now Palmer has a beautiful young woman in his life. A woman who loves and respects him for the self-made man that he is.Will Connor try to take her too?And what will Palmer do if he tries?
author: Susan Elle
